com.asp.smartbeergreenhouse.db

Class DBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.asp.smartbeergreenhouse.db.DBHelper

  • public class DBHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    DB Helper class

    Helper class to manage the DB operations (writing and reading) of the SQLite DB used.

    Author:
    Jaime Galan Martinez, Victor Aranda Lopez, Akos Zsolt Becsey.
